data.message: Take it back to "the way I am" Em, that style of rap and sound is #real 💯✌️be on top in a blink again the album sales will go back through the roof 😝😝 & btw I got all your albums on vinyl 😉

replies.message: All he has to do tho is make one new song and remind us who he is. No one but kells comes close to his level.

Yep you're right I mean drop something #hard don't worry about what's on the radio spins, we just want that raw, we need the insight to his life as we had so much in the early albums.. I think him and kells don't see eye to eye over a tweet on Em's daughter but that aside MGK is #DOPE be awesome if they did work one day..
Relapse? Hell: The Sequel? D12 Projects? Infinite? Slm Shady EP? You're far from having all, but that's a sweet collection
Vasilije Rakic good point I got most of those on CD but here is a beast of a collectors item from 1999 the first ever single on cassette

Vasilije he said albums. The Slim Shady EP is an EP. D12 projects are D12 not just Eminem so those dont count either. Neither do the Bad Meets Evil Projects. All he really needs are Relapse and Infinite. ( coincidentally, those are his two most statistically lyrical albums)
Damon got the right idea ^^^^ plus I doubt the D12 albums are even on vinyl yet or the EP..
